Summary: 8-10 foot tall albino/humanoid creature moves very quickly across street, into neighbors back yard.
divs: sighting detailsi honestly don't have much more to say other that what is in the above description - an 8-10 foot tall humanoid crossed the street, very quickly, and disappeared into a neighbors yard approximately 30 meters away. i had just arrived and was getting off my bike when i peripherally noticed something crossing the street - i glanced up to catch a fleeting outline of this thing's shape, color and size. definitely a bipedal\albino\human-looking dude. i put the dog inside and immediately took off on my bike down the connecting street to verify that it was someone out for a late-night run (for my own peace of mind) - i found no joggers after scouring the surrounding streets. i don't know what it was, but i do know that it scared the daylights out of me and has had me spooked ever since. i just read of similar events outside of london and decided to report my experience. also, the head on this thing was huge, though overall it seemed to be a very large and strong creature - not your typical skinny, frail and bug-eyed "humanoid". scary but exciting stuff people!
